About

Fast

High performance, lag-free UIs with a smooth, rich user experience are a priority in my daily development.

Quality

A strong attention to clean, re-usable code with an emphasis on low maintanance and high security.

Responsive

A focus on cross-browser compatibility and responsive design to ensure an optimal user experience on any device.

Cutting Edge

I love learning new tech, embrace change, and approach development as a process of constant learning and growing.

Who am I?

I am a driven full-stack dev with a passion for the creative process. I love front-end, immerisive UIs as well as robust backend data management. Let's build something amazing!

Projects

COMMENTS LAB

React, Redux, Ruby on Rails API, Postgres
Learn More

Comments Lab

Educational Saas Product

An online software product that eases the process of writing report card comments for educational professionals. Comments Lab provides an smooth, intuitive user interface, user data storage, and customizable users preferences. Core technologies include React/Redux, Ruby on Rails, and Postgres.

Visit Site

POWERTOOLS PLUS

React, Express, MongoDB
Learn More

PowerTools Plus

Scheduling Software

Highly secure scheduling platform utilizing OpenId authentication methods to login in users directly inside their district PowerSchool Portal. 3 different authentication levels exists, admin, teacher, and student, all with completely seperate access rights and views. It pulls data directly from the district's PowerSchool API instance, and also is connected to a seperate MongoDB instance to store user accounts, custom scheduling data, and custom Content Support Sections. Core technologies include Node.js, Express.js, React/Redux, and MongoDB. Project is still under development.

Visit Repo
